channel.title: Gauntlet Comics: Homefront Heroes (Masks)
channel.description:
![Homefront|502x500](upload://zB08dqburoQhKbWUbjHbzY9Il2r.jpeg)
It's 1942, and with the Golden Age of Comics in full swing , most of Gauntlet City's masked heroes have headed to Europe to battle Hitler's SS Ubermen or the Pacific to face off against Hirohito's Kusanagi Regiment. That means keeping Gauntlet City safe from fifth columnists, saboteurs, and undercover BlitzKinder will fall to you kids! We Can Do It!
Issue 1 of 5: Tuesday, April 2 at 8:00 PM Eastern: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LZ8c6OOYNn-aob-wKiE Issue 2 of 5: Tuesday, April 9 at 8:00 PM Eastern: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LZ8cVVWaVAms-23Fj1w Issue 3 of 5: Tuesday, April 16 at 8:00 PM Eastern: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LZ8ccFmOuKRIBF3Q3jK Issue 4 of 5: Tuesday, April 23 at 8:00 PM Eastern: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LZ8cm3oM88XR5Cx4eC3 Issue 5 of 5: Tuesday, April 30 at 8:00 PM Eastern: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LZ8dnHp51-3iIPIdT_c (edited)
[The Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html) will be in play and safety tools ([Script Change](http://tinyurl.com/nphed7m) and [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg)) will be in use.
